uniequip_002_hodrer.name: Cloak of Lingering Flame
uniequip_002_hodrer.EN: Provides an 18% <$ba.protect>Sanctuary</> effect to self and the allied unit directly behind this unit
uniequip_002_hodrer.CN: 使自身与身后一格的友军获得18%的<$ba.protect>庇护</>
uniequip_002_hodrer.mod: 使自身与身后一格的友军获得24%的<$ba.protect>庇护</>，且造成的物理伤害提升6%

uniequip_003_irene.name: Flames of Castigation
uniequip_003_irene.EN: Physical damage has a 50% chance to ignore 50% DEF. Chance increases to 100% against aerial units.
uniequip_003_irene.CN: 对敌人造成物理伤害时有50%概率无视其50%防御力，对空中单位概率提升至100%
uniequip_003_irene.mod: 对敌人造成物理伤害时有50%概率无视其50%防御力，对空中单位概率提升至100%，技能期间若击倒空中单位，技能结束时获得4点技力

uniequip_003_irene.name: Flames of Castigation
uniequip_003_irene.EN: Physical damage has a 50% chance to ignore 50% DEF. Chance increases to 100% against aerial units.
